c1.name: One Arrow to Rule Them All
c1.descriptionRaw: Fires 2 arrows per <color=#FFD780FF>Aimed Shot</color>. The second arrow deals 20% of the first arrow's DMG.
c1.description: Fires 2 arrows per Aimed Shot. The second arrow deals 20% of the first arrow's DMG.

c2.name: Bunny Triggered
c2.descriptionRaw:
Baron Bunny, new and improved! Hitting Baron Bunny's foot with a fully-charged Aimed Shot manually detonates it.
Explosion via manual detonation deals 200% additional DMG.
c2.description:
Baron Bunny, new and improved! Hitting Baron Bunny's foot with a fully-charged Aimed Shot manually detonates it.
Explosion via manual detonation deals 200% additional DMG.

c3.name: It Burns!
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Fiery Rain</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Fiery Rain by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: It's Not Just Any Doll...
c4.descriptionRaw: Decreases <color=#FFD780FF>Explosive Puppet</color>'s CD by 20%. Adds 1 additional charge.
c4.description: Decreases Explosive Puppet's CD by 20%. Adds 1 additional charge.

c5.name: It's Baron Bunny!
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Explosive Puppet</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Explosive Puppet by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Wildfire
c6.descriptionRaw: <color=#FFD780FF>Fiery Rain</color> increases all party members' Movement SPD by 15% and ATK by 15% for 10s.
c6.description: Fiery Rain increases all party members' Movement SPD by 15% and ATK by 15% for 10s.
